ovdesc.p: This is the internal file which contains details of all NETTED entries.
Entries are generated in this file by every on-line and batch process which involves NETTING payments.
This file is used by CREATE.NETTING to create NETTING records.
Only the See, Print and List functions may be used in this Application.

desc.p: The currency of this payment.
Part of a multi value group with the following fields:

VALUE.DATE CURRENCY NETTING.ACCOUNT AMOUNT ENTRY.TYPE COUNTERPARTY,NP.REF, NOSTRO.ACCOUNT, RELATED.REF,SEND.CORR.BK, REC.CORR.BK,INTERMED.BK, INTERM.ACCT, ACCT.WITH.BK, AWB.ACCT, BEN.CUST,BEN.ACCT.NO,BK.TO.BK
Each group contains the details for one payment that is to be netted. There may be more than one payment for a transaction.
System generated. No input.
This field specifies the currency and amount of Funds Transfer contract charges deducted by the Sender and by previous banks in the transaction chain. This field is mapped to Tag 71F in MT102.
Part of a multi value group starting from VALUE.DATE to REMITT.INFO. Each group contains the details for one payment that is to be netted.
System generated. No input.
This field specifies the currency for instructed amount. This field is mapped to tag 33.
Part of a multi value group starting from VALUE.DATE to REMITT.INFO. Each group contains the details for one payment that is to be netted.
System generated. No input.
This field specifies Exchange rate used to convert the instructed amount.
This field is mapped to Tag 36 in MT102
Part of a multi value group starting from VALUE.DATE to REMITT.INFO. Each group contains the details for one payment that is to be netted.
System generated. No input.
The Bk.To.Bk information (tag 72) given in the corresponding Funds Transfer Contract is stored here.
Part of a multi value group with the following fields:

VALUE.DATE CURRENCY NETTING.ACCOUNT AMOUNT ENTRY.TYPE COUNTERPARTY,NP.REF, NOSTRO.ACCOUNT, RELATED.REF,SEND.CORR.BK, REC.CORR.BK,INTERMED.BK, INTERM.ACCT, ACCT.WITH.BK, AWB.ACCT, BEN.CUST,BEN.ACCT.NO,BK.TO.BK
Each group contains the details for one payment that is to be netted. There may be more than one payment for a transaction.
System generated. No input.
The countparty for this payment. Valid customer number on the CUSTOMER application.
Part of a multi value group with the following fields:

VALUE.DATE CURRENCY NETTING.ACCOUNT AMOUNT ENTRY.TYPE COUNTERPARTY,NP.REF, NOSTRO.ACCOUNT, RELATED.REF,SEND.CORR.BK, REC.CORR.BK,INTERMED.BK, INTERM.ACCT, ACCT.WITH.BK, AWB.ACCT, BEN.CUST,BEN.ACCT.NO,BK.TO.BK
Each group contains the details for one payment that is to be netted. There may be more than one payment for a transaction.
System generated. No input.
The ordering Bank (tag 52) for this payment
Each group starting from field VALUE.DATE to REMITT.INFO contains the details for one payment that is to be netted.
System generated. No input.
This field hold the Swift charge detail (Tag 71) of the payment . This can have the value BEN or OUR or SHA.
Part of a multi value group starting from VALUE.DATE to REMITT.INFO.
Each group contains the details for one payment that is to be netted.
System generated. No input.
This field specifies remittance information from Funds transfer contract. This field is mapped to tag 70.
Part of a multi value group starting from VALUE.DATE to REMITT.INFO. Each group contains the details for one payment that is to be netted.
System generated. No input.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
The transaction identifier by which the Entry (and associated transaction) can be identified.
Generated by the system.
12 Character transaction reference. (Internal file, No input)
Fields VALUE.DATE toBk.To.Bk form a related multi value set. Standard T24 acount field.
This is a NOINPUT field-System update
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
This field specifies the currency and amount of the transaction charges due to the Receiver. This field is mapped to Tag 71G in MT102.
Part of a multi value group starting from VALUE.DATE to REMITT.INFO. Each group contains the details for one payment that is to be netted.
System generated. No input.
The Account Number of the Intermediary Bank as entered in the corresponding Funds Transfer contract is stored here (tag 56) .
Part of a multi value group with the following fields:

VALUE.DATE CURRENCY NETTING.ACCOUNT AMOUNT ENTRY.TYPE COUNTERPARTY,NP.REF, NOSTRO.ACCOUNT, RELATED.REF,SEND.CORR.BK, REC.CORR.BK,INTERMED.BK, INTERM.ACCT, ACCT.WITH.BK, AWB.ACCT, BEN.CUST,BEN.ACCT.NO,BK.TO.BK
Each group contains the details for one payment that is to be netted. There may be more than one payment for a transaction.
System generated. No input.
The reference of the NETTING transaction where this payment has been netted.

Initially this field contains no value, however the payment will be included in a net payment on the NETTING application and once this net payment is authorised then the reference will be written to this field.
Consequently any payment on this file where the NP.REF is empty is a payment waiting to be netted.
Part of a multi value group with the following fields:

VALUE.DATE CURRENCY NETTING.ACCOUNT AMOUNT ENTRY.TYPE COUNTERPARTY,NP.REF, NOSTRO.ACCOUNT, RELATED.REF,SEND.CORR.BK, REC.CORR.BK,INTERMED.BK, INTERM.ACCT, ACCT.WITH.BK, AWB.ACCT, xBEN.CUST,BEN.ACCT.NO,BK.TO.BK
Each group contains the details for one payment that is to be netted. There may be more than one payment for a transaction.
System generated. No input allowed.
The ordering Customer (tag 50) for this payment.
Part of a multi value group starting from VALUE.DATE to REMITT.INFO. Each group contains the details for one payment that is to be netted.
System generated. No input.
The value date of this payment.
Part of a multi value group with the following fields:

VALUE.DATE CURRENCY NETTING.ACCOUNT AMOUNT ENTRY.TYPE COUNTERPARTY,NP.REF, NOSTRO.ACCOUNT, RELATED.REF,SEND.CORR.BK, REC.CORR.BK,INTERMED.BK, INTERM.ACCT, ACCT.WITH.BK,AWB.ACCT,BEN.CUST,BEN.ACCT.NO,BK.TO.BK
Each group contains the details for one payment that is to be netted. There may be more than one payment for a transaction.

Part of a multi value group with the following fields:

VALUE.DATE CURRENCY NETTING.ACCOUNT AMOUNT ENTRY.TYPE COUNTERPARTY,NP.REF, NOSTRO.ACCOUNT, RELATED.REF,SEND.CORR.BK, REC.CORR.BK,INTERMED.BK, INTERM.ACCT, ACCT.WITH.BK, AWB.ACCT, BEN.CUST,BEN.ACCT.NO,BK.TO.BK
Each group contains the details for one payment that is to be netted. There may be more than one payment for a transaction.

The Intermediary Bank details as entered in the corresponding Funds Transfer contract is stored here (tag 56) .
Part of a multi value group with the following fields:

VALUE.DATE CURRENCY NETTING.ACCOUNT AMOUNT ENTRY.TYPE COUNTERPARTY,NP.REF, NOSTRO.ACCOUNT, RELATED.REF,SEND.CORR.BK, REC.CORR.BK,INTERMED.BK, INTERM.ACCT, ACCT.WITH.BK, AWB.ACCT, BEN.CUST,BEN.ACCT.NO,BK.TO.BK
Each group contains the details for one payment that is to be netted. There may be more than one payment for a transaction.
System generated. No input

VALUE.DATE CURRENCY NETTING.ACCOUNT AMOUNT ENTRY.TYPE COUNTERPARTY,NP.REF, NOSTRO.ACCOUNT, RELATED.REF,SEND.CORR.BK, REC.CORR.BK,INTERMED.BK, INTERM.ACCT, ACCT.WITH.BK, AWB.ACCT, BEN.CUST,BEN.ACCT.NO,BK.TO.BK
Each group contains the details for one payment that is to be netted. There may be more than one payment for a transaction.

The entry type of this payment. "S203" indicates that the record is created by FT application.
Part of a multi value group with the following fields:

VALUE.DATE CURRENCY NETTING.ACCOUNT AMOUNT ENTRY.TYPE COUNTERPARTY,NP.REF, NOSTRO.ACCOUNT, RELATED.REF,SEND.CORR.BK, REC.CORR.BK,INTERMED.BK, INTERM.ACCT, ACCT.WITH.BK, AWB.ACCT, BEN.CUST,BEN.ACCT.NO,BK.TO.BK

t.desc:
This field specifies the instructed amount in the Funds transfer contract. This field is mapped to tag 33
.
Part of a multi value group starting from VALUE.DATE to REMITT.INFO. Each group contains the details for one payment that is to be netted.
Validation Rules:
System generated. No input.

desc.p: The Receiver Correspondent bank (tag 54) for this payment.
Part of a multi value group with the following fields:

VALUE.DATE CURRENCY NETTING.ACCOUNT AMOUNT ENTRY.TYPE COUNTERPARTY,NP.REF, NOSTRO.ACCOUNT, RELATED.REF,SEND.CORR.BK, REC.CORR.BK,INTERMED.BK, INTERM.ACCT, ACCT.WITH.BK, AWB.ACCT, BEN.CUST,BEN.ACCT.NO,BK.TO.BK
Each group contains the details for one payment that is to be netted. There may be more than one payment for a transaction.
System generated. No input.
The netting account of this payment. This is the account against which the payment entry has been passed.
Part of a multi value group with the following fields:

VALUE.DATE CURRENCY NETTING.ACCOUNT AMOUNT ENTRY.TYPE COUNTERPARTY,NP.REF, NOSTRO.ACCOUNT, RELATED.REF,SEND.CORR.BK, REC.CORR.BK,INTERMED.BK, INTERM.ACCT, ACCT.WITH.BK, AWB.ACCT, BEN.CUST,BEN.ACCT.NO,BK.TO.BK

System generated. No input.
This field specifies bank operation code from Funds transfer contract. This field is mapped to tag 23.
Part of a multi value group starting from VALUE.DATE to REMITT.INFO. Each group contains the details for one payment that is to be netted.
